original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph, badges as b, votes as v, users as u WHERE ph.UserId = u.Id AND v.UserId = u.Id AND c.UserId = u.Id AND b.UserId = u.Id AND b.Date>=CAST('2010-09-26 12:17:14' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.BountyAmount>=0 AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-20 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.DownVotes>=0 AND u.DownVotes<=0 AND u.UpVotes>=0 AND u.UpVotes<=31 AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-06 20:38:52' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date >= TIMESTAMP '2010-09-26 12:17:14'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.UserId=E3.UserId)

CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.BountyAmount >= 0 AND (CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-20 00:00:00' AND CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 00:00:00')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E3.UserId=E4.UserId)

CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.DownVotes = 0 AND (CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) <= 31) AND users.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-06 20:38:52'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E4E5 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E2E3E4.UserId=E5.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E4E5 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3E4E5 WHERE E1.UserId=E2E3E4E5.UserId)
